login.title: Welcome
login.subtitle: Enter your credentials to access the panel.

quotes.text: Engineering is not only knowing and understanding, but making known and making understood.
quotes.author: Engineers Association of Peru

quotes.text: Engineering is the art of applying scientific knowledge to the invention, improvement and use of technique.
quotes.author: Engineers Association of Peru

quotes.text: Engineers transform dreams into reality, solving today's challenges to build tomorrow.
quotes.author: Engineers Association of Peru

quotes.text: Excellence in engineering requires passion, dedication and commitment to sustainable development.
quotes.author: Engineers Association of Peru

quotes.text: A good engineer not only solves problems, but anticipates solutions for future generations.
quotes.author: Engineers Association of Peru

quotes.text: Engineering is the profession that makes the impossible possible, transforming ideas into infrastructure.
quotes.author: Engineers Association of Peru

validation.email_invalid: Please enter a valid institutional email
validation.password_min_length: Password must be at least 8 characters
validation.password_uppercase: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter
validation.password_number: Password must contain at least one number

forgot.title: Recover your password
forgot.subtitle: Enter your email and we'll send you a reset link.
forgot.success: If the email exists, we've sent a recovery link.
forgot.error: We couldn't process the request. Please try again.

confirm.title: Confirm your email
confirm.subtitle: We will verify your account so you can sign in.
confirm.success: Your email was verified successfully. You can now sign in.
confirm.already_verified: This account was already verified. You can sign in.
confirm.invalid: The link is invalid or has expired.

reset.title: Create a new password
reset.subtitle: Enter your new password to regain access.
reset.success: Your password was updated. You can now sign in.
reset.error: We couldn't update the password. Please try again.
reset.missing_token: The link is invalid or has expired.

validation.password_uppercase: Must contain at least one uppercase letter
validation.password_number: Must contain at least one number

logout.confirm: Are you sure you want to logout?

dashboard.title: Overview
dashboard.subtitle: Welcome to the CIP Events administration panel.

upcoming_events.title: Upcoming Events
upcoming_events.subtitle: You have {{count}} events scheduled for the next 7 days.

events_view.create_subtitle: Complete the information to publish an event on the CIP calendar.
events_view.title: My Events
events_view.subtitle: Manage chapter events and their registrations.

modality_description.virtual: The event takes place entirely online

empty.title: No events
empty.description: Create your first event to get started.
empty.no_results: No events found matching your search criteria.

location.label: Location
location.create_new: Type to create a new address

form.date_future: Start date must be in the future
form.date_end_after_start: End date must be after start date

drawer.subtitle: Complete the event information
drawer.info: After creating the event you can add image, location, virtual access, tickets and more details.
drawer.name: Event name

image.title: Image
image.hint: PNG, JPG or WebP • Maximum 5MB • Recommended: 1200x630px
image.banner_hint: This image will be shown as the event banner in the listing and details page.

config.title: Date and Modality
config.description: When and how it will take place.

location.title: Location
location.name: Venue Name
location.map_hint: Copy the link from Google Maps for easy navigation

virtual.title: Virtual Access
virtual.meeting_url_hint: The link will be sent to attendees before the event

confirm.title: Save event?
confirm.description: You are about to create a new event. Once saved, you can edit or publish it from the management view.
confirm.create_description: The event will be saved as a draft. You can edit and publish it when ready.

toast.created_description: Now you can complete the event details.
toast.draft_description: The event has been saved as a draft.
toast.error_description: Check the data and try again.

edit_event.title: Edit Event
edit_event.subtitle: Modify the event information.
edit_event.error_description: Please check the data and try again.
edit_event.error_unknown: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
edit_event.confirm_description: Changes will be applied immediately to the event.

event_management.coming_soon: This section will be available soon.

general.basic_info_desc: Main event details visible to the public.
general.title: Event Title
general.description_placeholder: Describe the event, its objectives and target audience...

location.title: Physical Location
location.description: Information about the venue for the in-person event.
location.name: Venue Name
location.reference_placeholder: E.g: In front of Kennedy Park

virtual.title: Virtual Access
virtual.description: Virtual platform configuration for the event.

table.title: Ticket Types
table.description: Manage the ticket types available for this event.
table.name: Name

empty.title: No tickets configured
empty.description: Create your first ticket so attendees can register for the event.

dialog.create_description: Configure a new ticket type for the event
dialog.description_placeholder: E.g: Includes coffee break and materials
dialog.stock_hint: Maximum number of tickets available for sale.
dialog.max_per_order_hint: Maximum quantity a user can purchase
dialog.cip_validation_description: Only licensed engineers with active membership
dialog.visibility_description: The ticket will appear on the event page

delete.title: Delete ticket?
delete.description: This action cannot be undone. The ticket "{{name}}" will be permanently deleted.

toast.error_status: Could not change the ticket status.

validation.price_min: Price must be greater than or equal to 0
validation.stock_min: Stock must be greater than or equal to 0

placeholder.sessions: Soon you will be able to manage event sessions here.
placeholder.enrollments: Soon you will be able to view the attendees list here.
placeholder.speakers: Soon you will be able to manage speakers here.

empty.title: No sessions configured
empty.description: Create your first session to organize the event schedule.

dialog.create_description: Configure a new session for the event
dialog.description_hint: Optional. Detail the topic or content to cover
dialog.room_hint: Optional. Indicate where the session will take place
dialog.meeting_url_hint: Optional. Link for virtual or hybrid sessions

delete.title: Delete session?
delete.description: This action cannot be undone. The session "{{name}}" will be permanently deleted.

sections.coming_soon: Soon you will be able to manage this section here.
sections.no_content: No content available for this route yet.

error_state.title: Error loading data
error_state.default_message: An error occurred while loading the data

profile.title: My Profile
profile.subtitle: Manage your personal information and nominal data
profile.nominal_data_notice: This data will be used to issue official certificates. Make sure it matches your ID document.
profile.legal_name_placeholder: As it appears on your document
profile.legal_lastname_placeholder: As it appears on your document
profile.person_readonly_notice: Nominal data is used to issue official certificates. Contact support if you need to correct them.

detail.no_profile: This user has not completed their profile

detail.activate_desc: Are you sure you want to activate {{name}}? They will be able to access the system again.

users.create_subtitle: Complete the information to register a new user in the system.

account.title: Account
account.generate_hint: Generated password includes uppercase, lowercase, numbers, and symbols.

role.title: Role
role.description: User permissions and access in the system.
role.info: The role determines what actions the user can perform. Administrators have full access to the system.
role.info_short: The role determines user permissions in the system.

toast.create_description: The user has been created successfully. They will receive an email to verify their account.
toast.error_description: Check the data and try again.

list.title: User Management
list.subtitle: Manage platform access and permissions.
list.search_placeholder: Search by name, email or ID...

resend_verification.throttle: You must wait before sending another email

reset_password.link_description: An email will be sent to the user with a link to create their own password. The link will be valid for 24 hours.
reset_password.password_description: Generate or type a password. It will be sent to the user by email.
reset_password.link_success: Reset link email has been sent
reset_password.password_success: Password set and sent to user
